entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -14.9°C

Visibility: 11.3 km

Dewpoint: -19.1°C

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near the Rockies. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 32 in the evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
